msg.spa: Hi @contact.prepiloto_nombre ,  in 2 days on the day of the @(DAY(contact.prepiloto_remnextapptdate2)) you have your second clinic visit. Don’t miss your chance to raise any questions or doubts you have. This is your opportunity to ask whatever you need to manage your pregnancy.
Again, after your visit we will ask you a couple of short questions about your visit. This information will be used to measure the quality of care and rate the doctors.
